mapper.select: select * from goot6.Destinations where member_id = #{member_id} and destination_isDelete = 'N'
select * from goot6.Destinations where destination_no = #{destination_no} and destination_isDelete = 'N'
select * from goot6.Destinations where member_id = #{member_id} and destination_no = default_address and destination_isDelete = 'N'

select bp.buyProduct_no, p.product_name, p.product_img1, bp.buyProduct_qty, p.product_sellPrice, bp.buyProduct_deliveriPay, bp.buyProduct_totPrice, m.member_id from BuyProducts bp inner join Members m inner join Products p inner join Buckets b on bp.member_id = m.member_id and bp.product_id = p.product_id and b.member_id = m.member_id where bp.member_id = #{member_id} and bp.buyProduct_isFinished = 'N' and b.bucket_isDelete = 'N' and b.bucket_isChecked = 'Y' group by buyProduct_no
select member_totPoint from Members where member_id = #{member_id};

insert into Points (buyProduct_no, member_id, grade_name, buyProduct_totPrice, point_reason, point_usedPoint, point_futurePoint, payment_date) values (#{buyProduct_no}, #{member_id}, #{grade_name}, #{buyProduct_totPrice}, #{point_reason}, #{point_usedPoint}, #{point_futurePoint}, #{payment_date});
select max(payInfo_no) from PayInfos
select max(payment_serialNo) from Payments
mapper.insert: insert into Payments (payment_no, member_id, payInfo_no, destination_no, buyProduct_no, payment_date, payment_deliveryMsg) values (#{payment_no}, #{member_id}, #{payInfo_no}, #{destination_no}, #{buyProduct_no}, #{payment_date}, #{payment_deliveryMsg})
mapper.select: select product_id, buyProduct_qty from BuyProducts where buyProduct_no = #{buyProduct_no}
mapper.update: update Products set product_saleQty = product_saleQty + #{buyProduct_qty}, product_totQty = product_totQty - #{buyProduct_qty} where product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into Points (member_id, grade_name, point_reason, point_usedPoint, point_futurePoint, payment_date) values (#{member_id}, #{grade_name}, '상품구매', #{point_usedPoint}, #{point_futurePoint}, #{payment_date})
mapper.update: update Buckets set bucket_isDelete = 'Y' where member_id = #{member_id} and bucket_isChecked = 'Y'
update BuyProducts set buyProduct_isFinished = 'Y' where buyProduct_no = #{buyProduct_no}
mapper.select: select distinct * from (select d.destination_toUser, d.destination_mobile, d.destination_zipCode, d.destination_address, d.destination_addressDetail, p.payInfo_way, p.payInfo_date from Payments pay, Destinations d, PayInfos p where pay.destination_no = d.destination_no and pay.payInfo_no = p.payInfo_no and pay.payment_no = #{payment_no}) as lst
select * from Products where product_id = #{product_id}
select * from Buckets where member_id = #{member_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into Buckets(member_id, product_id, bucket_buyQty, bucket_sellPrice, bucket_totBuyPrice) value(#{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{bucket_buyQty}, #{bucket_sellPrice}, #{bucket_sellPrice})
mapper.select: select count(*) from Buckets where member_id = #{member_id}
select * from NonUserBuckets where nonUserBucket_ssid = #{nonUserBucket_ssid} and product_id = #{product_id}
select count(*) from NonUserBuckets where nonUserBucket_ssid = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into NonUserBuckets(nonUserBucket_ssid, product_id, nonUserBucket_buyQty, nonUserBucket_sellPrice, nonUserBucket_totBuyPrice) value(#{nonUserBucket_ssid}, #{product_id}, #{nonUserBucket_buyQty}, #{nonUserBucket_sellPrice}, #{nonUserBucket_totBuyPrice})
mapper.select: select avg(pr.prodReview_grade) as star, pr.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_sellPrice, p.product_img1 from ProdReviews pr, Products p where pr.product_id = p.product_id group by pr.product_id order by star desc limit 0, 4
select * from Products where product_show="Y" order by product_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select count(*) from Products where product_show="Y"

select * from Products where
product_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_detail like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and product_show="Y" order by product_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};

select count(*) from Products where
product_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_detail like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and product_show="Y" limit #{pageStert} ,#{pageNum}

select * from Products where
product_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_detail like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and product_show="Y" order by
product_id desc
product_sellPrice desc
product_sellPrice
limit #{pageStert} ,#{pageNum}

select count(*) from Products where
product_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
product_detail like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and product_show="Y"

select prod.product_id, maincg.mainCategory_content, middlecg.middleCategory_content, prod.product_name, prod.product_sellPrice, prod.product_date, prod.product_img1, prod.product_prodAvgScore, prod.product_totQty, prod.product_popularProduct from MainCategories maincg, MiddleCategories middlecg, Products prod where maincg.mainCategory_id = middlecg.mainCategory_id and prod.mainCategory_id = maincg.mainCategory_id and prod.middleCategory_id = middlecg.middleCategory_id and prod.product_show = 'Y'
and prod.product_sellPrice <= 50000
and prod.product_sellPrice >= #{minPrice} and prod.product_sellPrice <= #{maxPrice}
and prod.product_sellPrice >= 1000000
and prod.product_prodAvgScore = #{prodScore}
and prod.product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') group by prod.product_id
order by prod.product_saleQty desc, prod.product_prodAvgScore desc
order by prod.product_sellPrice asc
order by prod.product_sellPrice desc
order by prod.product_date desc
limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(*) from (select count(*) from Products as prod left join ( select pr.product_id, count(pr.product_id) as p_review from Products p inner join ProdReviews pr on pr.product_id = p.product_id group by pr.product_id) as num on prod.product_id = num.product_id inner join MainCategories mc on prod.mainCategory_id = mc.mainCategory_id inner join MiddleCategories mic on prod.middleCategory_id = mic.middleCategory_id
where prod.product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and prod.product_show = 'Y'
and prod.product_sellPrice <= 50000
and prod.product_sellPrice >= #{minPrice} and prod.product_sellPrice <= #{maxPrice}
and prod.product_sellPrice >= 1000000
and prod.product_prodAvgScore = #{prodScore}
group by prod.product_id order by p_review desc) as searchResult
select count(*) as prouctReview_count from ProdReviews where product_id = #{product_id}
select product_id, product_img1 from Products where product_popularProduct = 'Y' ORDER BY RAND() limit 0, 6
select * from goot6.Destinations where member_id = #{member_id} and destination_isDelete = "N"
mapper.update: update Destinations set default_address = #{destination_no} where member_id = #{member_id}

update Destinations set destination_nickname = #{destination_nickname}, destination_address = #{destination_address}, destination_addressDetail = #{destination_addressDetail}, destination_updateDate = now(), destination_toUser = #{destination_toUser}, destination_mobile = #{destination_mobile}, destination_zipCode = #{destination_zipCode} where destination_no = #{destination_no}
mapper.insert: insert into Destinations(member_id, destination_nickname, destination_address, destination_addressDetail, destination_toUser, destination_mobile, destination_zipCode) values(#{member_id}, #{destination_nickname}, #{destination_address}, #{destination_addressDetail}, #{destination_toUser}, #{destination_mobile}, #{destination_zipCode})
mapper.update: update Destinations set destination_isDelete = "Y" where destination_no = #{destination_no}
mapper.select: select * from Destinations where destination_no = #{dstno}
